title: Slow Down First. That’s How Newsrooms Move Faster With AI.
content:
Most newsrooms assume they need an army of engineers or a big tech budget to experiment with AI. They don't. What they need is a repeatable process, the right collaborators and time to understand their problems before reaching for tools, AI or otherwise.

That's the premise behind the Newsroom AI Lab. In ...
creator: Paige Moody
sourceDescription: Advancing media innovation to foster public trust

title: Hacks/Hackers’ Newsroom AI Lab add three new partners
content:
Hacks/Hackers’ Newsroom AI Lab is expanding to add three new partners: Bellingcat, Prison Journalism Project and Trusting News. The Lab helps participating small- and mid-sized news organizations build capacity in order to scope, evaluate and manage technical journalism projects involving AI. 

All three new Newsroom...
